attributes.action: UK Government to mandate closure of restaurants during COVID-19 outbreak
attributes.background: We need Government to formally mandate the closure of restaurants during the COVID-19 outbreak. Whilst it’s only a strong recommendation insurance will not support.

rejection.details:
Since this petition was created, the Government has announced that restaurants are to close. It has also asked everyone to stay at home. You can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can find out more about how to protect yourself and others from coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
